name: blumea
description: Blumea is a streamlined Bloom filter npm package for your node apps.

scripts.test/classical: echo "Manual tests on classical bloom.." && cd Tests && node test-classical.js -log
scripts.test/counting: echo "Manual tests on counting bloom.." && cd Tests && node test-counting.js -log
scripts.test/partitioned: echo "Manual tests on partitioned bloom.." && cd Tests && node test-partitioned.js -log
scripts.test/scalable: echo "Manual tests on scalable bloom.." && cd Tests && node test-scalable.js -log
scripts.test/cuckoo: echo "Manual tests on cuckoo bloom.." && cd Tests && node test-cuckoo.js -log

author: akash.c1500@gmail.com
